Though Katya was hit hard by the tackle, she dodged the pinning by 
dashing on the side of Owlhawk. She replied with a sledgehammer-like 
kick at his left arm.

Katya: I am impressed. You may have a Wolf's soul after all...

Ragnar heard that and felt he had to reply.

Ragnar: Maybe it is more the Bear's stregth, though he is too 
reckless... He must be a Wolf.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Ignore that I must have gotten mixed up and
> thought she was fighting Rodimus.
> 
> BIC:  Owlhawk follows up the punches (I finally went
> back and actually read the posts) by firing his
> rockets and sending his shoulder right at her Mech's
> stomach trying to pound her between himself and the
> wall.
>

> > Owlhawk stared at the fight.
> > 
> > Owlhawk:  Are these people crazy or
